body { background: #161823; } .aboutContainer { position: relative; width: 1050px; margin: 100px auto 0; background: #161823; } .aT,.aR,.aB,.aL { width: 100%; height: 100%; position: absolute; } .aT { width: 0; border-top: 1px solid rgb(233, 241, 246); -webkit-animation: tA 1s ease 1s forwards; -moz-animation: tA 1s ease 1s forwards; } .aR { height: 0; border-right: 1px solid rgb(233, 241, 246); -moz-animation: rA 1s ease 1s forwards; -webkit-animation: rA 1s ease 1s forwards; } .aB { left: 953px; width: 0; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(233, 241, 246); -moz-animation: bA 1s ease 1s forwards; -webkit-animation: bA 1s ease 1s forwards; } .aL { height: 0; top: 100%; border-left: 1px solid rgb(233, 241, 246); -moz-animation: lA 1s ease 1s forwards; -webkit-animation: lA 1s ease 1s forwards; } @keyframes tA { to { width: 100%; } } @keyframes rA { to { height: 100%; } } @keyframes bA { to { left: 0; width: 100%; } } @keyframes lA { to { top: 0; height: 100% } } .svg { margin: 50px 30px; } .draw { stroke-dasharray: 1310; stroke-dashoffset: 1310; fill: #161823; -moz-transition: fill 2s ease; -webkit-transition: fill 2s ease; -moz-animation: draw 6s ease 2s forwards; -webkit-animation: draw 6s ease 2s forwards; } @keyframes draw { to{ stroke-dashoffset: 0; } } .fill { stroke-dasharray: 1310; /*å®šä¹‰æè¾¹çš„è™šçº¿é•¿åº¦ï¼Œå¦‚æœæä¾›å¥‡æ•°ä¸ªï¼Œåˆ™ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨å¤åˆ¶è¯¥å€¼æˆå¶æ•°*/ stroke-dashoffset: 1310; /*å®šä¹‰è™šçº¿æè¾¹çš„åç§»é‡ï¼ˆåœ¨è·¯å¾„å¼€å§‹çš„å‰é¢ï¼Œçœ‹ä¸åˆ°ï¼‰*/ -moz-animation: fill 5s ease 2s forwards; -webkit-animation: fill 5s ease 2s forwards; } @keyframes fill { to { stroke-dashoffset: 0; fill: #161823; } } .aboutContainer .content{ width: 1010px; padding: 50px 20px 50px; background: rgb(233, 241, 246); opacity: 0; -moz-transition: opacity 2s ease 2s; -webkit-transition: opacity 2s ease 2s; } .headerImg { width: 200px; opacity: 0; margin: -35px auto 0; } .imgAnimation { -moz-animation: iA 2s ease forwards; -webkit-animation: iA 2s ease forwards; } @keyframes iA { to { margin-top: 0px; opacity: 1; } } .img { width: 100%; } .aboutContainer .content p { width: 100%; height: 18px; text-align: center; font-size: 16px; color: #606060; line-height: 5px; opacity: 0; } .pAnimation { -moz-animation: pA 1s ease forwards; -webkit-animation: pA 1s ease forwards; } @keyframes pA { to { opacity: 1; line-height: 18px; } } .aboutContainer .content .year { margin: 30px 0; font-size: 14px; color: #9B989F; }

body { width: 100%; position: relative; background: #161823; } .menu-section { position: fixed; top: 10px; left: 50%; width: 1200px; opacity: 1; border-radius: 6px; transform: translateX(-50%); } .menu-section-black { background: #cccccc; } .menu-section-animation { width: 100%; opacity: 0.5; margin-top: 0; border-radius: 0; top: 0; animation: menuSectionAnimation 0.5s ease; } @keyframes menuSectionAnimation { 0%{ top: 10px; width: 1200px; opacity: 1; } 100%{ top: 0; width: 100%; opacity: 0.5; } } .searchList { position: fixed; top: 45px; } .contactContainer { padding-top: 80px; padding-bottom: 20px; color: #cccccc; } .contact p { margin: 0; } #disqus_thread { background: #e9f1f6; width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; border-radius: 6px; padding: 0 10px; box-shadow: 3px -3px 5px #85918f; } .footer { position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100px; text-align: center; line-height: 100px; color: #cccccc; font-size: 14px; background: #161823; } .footer a { text-decoration: none; cursor: pointer; } .nav .searchBtn, .search{ background: #cccccc; }
